statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM products ORDER BY category_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category_id IS NULL
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category_id = 5 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT products.product_id, products.product_name, categories.category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY categories.category_name, products.product_name;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories LEFT JOIN product_categories ON categories.category_id = product_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50

SELECT category_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM categories LEFT JOIN product_categories ON categories.category_id = product_categories.category_id LEFT JOIN products ON product_categories.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM product_categories WHERE category_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price, category_id FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id INNER JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 AND category_id IN (2,3) ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, p.product_name, c.category_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON u.user_id = pc.product_id LEFT JOIN products p ON pc.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_id = 1 OR c.category_id IS NULL ORDER BY u.user_name ASC, c.category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories on products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(review_id) as total_reviews FROM products LEFT JOIN product_reviews ON products.product_id = product_reviews.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, review_text, rating FROM products JOIN product_reviews ON products.product_id = product_reviews.product_id WHERE products.category_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id FROM products WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, image_url FROM products JOIN product_images ON products.product_id = product_images.product_id;
SELECT product_name, review_text, rating FROM products JOIN product_reviews ON products.product_id = product_reviews.product_id WHERE rating > 3;
